price: The Trumpet will be blown[15] [again], and at once they will rush from their graves to their Lord.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ
footnotes: [15] i.e., the second blast or blow.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fa-idhā hum mina al-ajdāthi ilā rabbihim yansilūna
